text: Arjun Bijlani (born 31 October 1982) is an Indian television actor. He played Aalekh in Right Left and Mayank Sharma in Miley Jab Hum Tum. His other work includes Jo Biwi Se Kare Pyaar. In April 2015, Bijlani played Shikhar Mehra in Meri Aashiqui Tumse Hi. He plays the lead role of Hritikh in the television drama Naagin. == History == Bijlani was born on 31 October 1982. He has appeared in many advertisements, including LG, Samsung and BPL Mobile. He has been in many music videos. He was in Kartika, a Disney Channel show, with Jennifer Winget. He has been in many serials, including Miley Jab Hum Tum,Pardes Mein Mila Koi Apna. He also hosted a show named Road Diaries. ==Personal life== He is married to Neha Swami and they have one children Ayaan Bijlani. ==Filmography== ===Television=== Year Show Role Source 2004 Kartika Ankush 2005 Remix Vikram 2006-2008 Left Right Left Alekh Sharma 2008 Mohe Rang De Sanjay 2008–2010 Miley Jab Hum Tum Mayank Sharma 2011 Pardes Mein Mila Koi Apna Chandu 2012 Road Dairies Himself(Host) 2012 Teri Meri Love Stories Raghu 2013 Kaali - Ek Punar Avatar Dev 2013 Chintu Ban Gaya Gentleman 2013 Jo Biwi Se Kare Pyaar Aditya Khanna 2014 Yeh Hai Aashiqui Varun 2014-2015 Box Cricket League Himself 2015 CID Himself April 2015 – 2015 Meri Aashiqui Tumse Hi Shikhar Mehra 2015–Present Naagin Rithik Raheja/Prince Yuvraj Singh/Raja Sangram Singh ===Movies=== Year Movie 2012 Full Phukre 2012 I Guess 2013 Caught in the web 2016 Direct Ishq == References == == Other websites == * * Arjun Bijlani Official website Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Mumbai Category:Indian television actors
